Header.title: Sustainable Mobility Solution Provider
Header.paragraph: EvViron provides innovative solution towards a sustainable greener mobility.

Services.name: Green Trip Planner
Services.text: Recommend the best possible route with less carbon foot print. Find the shortest distance that will consume less CO2

Services.name: Locate Charging station
Services.text: Locate charging station though your route. The smart charging solution will enable your to have best services at our partner charging stations.

Services.name: Billing and Invoice
Services.text: Automated billing solutions that is dynamic and based on the traffic rate applicable in different geography.

Services.name: Power Managment
Services.text: Provide software solution to manage the grid to charging station load.

Services.name: Customer Support
Services.text: Our innovative solution will provide you complete solution to manage customers and their experience.

Services.name: Charging Station Managment and Testing
Services.text: Complete solution will be provided to integrate the charging station with cloud systems.

Features.title: OCPP compliant charging station management
Features.text: Support all types of ocpp charging stations. Complies with ISO 15118 and OCPP 2.0.1 enabling vehicle-to-grid (V2G) communications

Features.title: Sustainable Trip Planning
Features.text: Profile the complete supply chain. Measure the CO2 emission. Recommend alternative mobility solutions. Find the cleanest path between a source and destination

Features.title: Charging Station Locator
Features.text: Find all all charging stations located in a radius. Schedule slot at charging station. Charge your vehcile in real time

Features.title: Payment management
Features.text: Billing and Invoice for based on traffic applicable in diifferent place.
